def_en: If you regret something that you have done, you wish that you had not done it.
Regret is a feeling of sadness or disappointment, which is caused by something that has happened or something that you have done or not done.

def_cn: 为…抱歉;很遗憾地说/通知你
def_en: You can say that you regret something as a polite way of saying that you are sorry about it. You use expressions such as I regret to say or I regret to inform you to show that you are sorry about something.
If someone expresses regret about something, they say that they are sorry about it.
